title: Executive Order 7372-Amendment of Schedule A of the Civil Service Rules
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me by the provisions of paragraph Eighth of subdivision SECOND of section 2 of the Civil Service Act of January 16, 1883 (ch. 27, 22 Stat. 403, 404), Section 2 of Executive Order No. 7228 of November 18, 1935, is hereby amended by changing the number of the new subdivision added by said order to Schedule A of the Civil Service Rules from XXV to XXVI.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 7372-Amendment of Schedule A of the Civil Service Rules Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/356172
